review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: How much or how frequently were you able to experience being present yesterday? The
            Path is when you engage in the process of growth. Be on The Path.

step_of_the_day.title:
Step of the Day:
            The best way to learn to be present is to get a felt sense of the experience. Noticing what being present
            feels like (Pillar #7)
step_of_the_day.content: "Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood." Ralph Waldo Emerson

action_step:
As RWE says, if you want to really learn a lesson and understand it, it must be lived. Therefore, today itâ€™s
            about being present, but then, most importantly, pay attention to how you feel and experience being present.
            This is The Path to getting it.
journal_entry: Write about your experience with presence.
